subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade and LeBron James scored all but 4 of Miami’s 26 points in the fourth quarter and combined for 17 points in a 19-4 run to finish the game.
snippet: Dwyane Wade and LeBron James scored all but 4 of Miami’s 26 points in the fourth quarter and combined for 17 points in a 19-4 run to finish the game.
